section.heading: Prohibition on sale of cigarettes that are not fire-standard-compliant.
section.text: No cigarette may be sold or offered for sale in the District of Columbia unless:

para.text: It has been tested in accordance with the test method specified in § 7-1753(a)(2);
It meets the performance standard required by § 7-1753(a)(4);
The manufacturer has filed a written certification with the Mayor, or the Mayor’s delegate, in accordance with § 7-1754; and
It has been marked in accordance with § 7-1754(b).
